Posts.Content: I have cirrhosis already from autoimmue hepatitis.  I had my lumpectomy last week.  Next week I get pathology.  HOPEFULLY they said, I will just need radiation.  Well NOW after reading your posts I am SO afraid it will REALLY do my liver in for good.  There is compensated cirrhosis (you are still functioning well) and decompensated....downward liver spiral.  I am REALLy afraid this will set me on the road to the end.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer
